job_history.work_description: General recruitment with a focus on university recruitment: create job postings, and connect with students; conduct telephonic screening. Sourced the candidates through internal Applicant Tracking System. Track key dates and deadlines and maintained specific personnel lists. Posting positions through approved recruitment channels. Screen all applicants based on their qualifications and background. Hiring employees and initiated the new hire paperwork process. Researched and prepared a new termination of employment policy.

Create job descriptions for new openings. Manage employee information systems. Gathered personnel records from all employees from each department. Conducted job analysis and job evaluations, resulting in quality job specifications.
Moved to the US in 2015. Waiting to obtain the necessary employment authorization and permanent residency.

Managed end-to-end recruitment (sourcing, screening, reference checks, negotiation and offer generation). Sourced and updated candidates through Applicant Tracking System. Executed rapid talent acquisition strategies e.g., in a span of 6 months, I recruited 122 employees to grow an engineering team from 8 to 130 employees. Hired C-level candidates by engaging passive candidates. Managed relationships with staffing agencies. Researched new sources of recruitment and market intelligence. Led the creation of recruiting plans for all open positions. Developed salary proposals for new recruits. Partnered with local organizations and universities for engagement and interest in jobs offered in their community. Developed and facilitated job recruitment fairs. Promptly corresponded with all applicants and coordinated and conducted interviews. Networked with industry contacts, association memberships and associates. Promoted from recruiter to senior recruiter since 04/2013.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in end-to-end recruitment, including sourcing, screening, and negotiation, with a proven track record of rapid talent acquisition and hiring C-level candidates.

skills.name: Talent Acquisition
skills.explanation: Successfully grew an engineering team from 8 to 130 employees in a span of 6 months, demonstrating expert-level skills in talent acquisition.

skills.name: Employee Management
skills.explanation: Managed employee information systems, gathered personnel records, and conducted job analysis and evaluations, showing strong proficiency in employee management.

skills.name: Job Analysis
skills.explanation: Conducted job analysis and evaluations, resulting in quality job specifications, indicating strong proficiency in job analysis.

skills.name: Applicant Tracking System
skills.explanation: Utilized Applicant Tracking System to source and update candidates, showing strong proficiency in using this tool.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Led the creation of recruiting plans and developed salary proposals for new recruits, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Promptly corresponded with all applicants and coordinated and conducted interviews, showing a solid level of proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Developed and facilitated job recruitment fairs, indicating some practical experience in project management.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Has a Master's degree in Human Resources and extensive experience in HR-related roles, demonstrating expert-level mastery in Human Resources.
